Title: Two Cinderellas
Writer: Noelle Valdivia, David E. Kelley (created by), Jonathan Shapiro (created by)
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Nina Arianda, Ana de la Reguera, Tania Raymonde
Plot: Believing his client will soon be a free man, Billy joins Marisol for a romantic weekend in Mexico, only for his case to fall apart at home.
